content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was i'm my backyard ,at night,with my dogs and listening to music on my phone when i heard something flying over heard. i'm used to hearing planes at night so i didn't think anything of it . i looked to see it was just a plane flying by like normal. about 30 minutes later, i heard something that sounded like a jet. i looked up to see a very bright light coming towards my house. i sat completely still and watched it. when i frits saw it i thought it was another plane but as it got closer, i realize it was too low to the ground to be a plane. i continued watching it as it flew over head not moving at all. as it came closer to me, my phone shut off as well as my music. i didn't know what was happening but i knew it wasn't normal. i watched as it made a turn in the air that was nothing like a plane turning. it turned towards the woods behind me instead of the straight path over my house. i continued watching it until it disappeared behind the trees of the woods. after i lost sight, my music turned back own like nothing happened. i didn't know what to think at the time other than it was no airplane or helicopter. i ran back inside not feeling safe outdoors for the rest of the night.
content.summary: It flew over head like a plane but it was much too low to the ground to be one.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch and out of the corner of my eye, right above the treetops to the east of my house i saw a reddish/orange orb light up in the sky. not long after i saw a 2nd and 3rd light up one right after the other in a horizontal line. the three orbs stayed lit together for approx. 25 seconds and then at all once they disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a reddish orb light up in the sky and then a 2nd a 3rd. all of the orbs appeared to be the same size, shape and color. the orbs all remained directly next to one another for approx.  25 seconds and then all 3 orbs disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was about 8-10 and looking forward to going to school in the morning. the previous nights my father and i had been out on our boat and talking about ufo sightings that seem to be pooping up as of late. the topic came up because a low flying plane came over head that had some type of a reddish orange glow from the under belly. the light was pulsing and seemed to be rotating at the time. i recall my dad saying that must be what everyone thinks is a ufo. i don't recall if it was that night or a few after i was asleep in bed when i woke , for what i thought was no reason. but i noticed a a glow all around the house as if there was a fire all around it. there was a slight humming noise but you could barley make it out. i recall being extremely frightened but thought i had to get my dad. i don't recall ever getting to my feet and heading to his room but i must have. because the next thing i remember was i was standing at the far window of the bedroom looking to the sky. as i looked i saw three triangle shaped objects come together and join ! they mad one , what looked like a solid aircraft and where just hovering for about 30 sec to a min. then suddenly they went off almost straight up and i never saw them again. i somehow, again i don't know how but i woke and it was morning. i thought maybe i had just dreamed all this and never said a word. that night i saw on the news that some unknown object had caused a power failure in a nearby town. i will never forget that night and this is the first time i have ever said anything about it. but i have often been troubled by the lapses of time and not remembering getting out of bed to get to the window.
content.summary: Hovered over our home. i woke to it never left my bed but some time later i was at the window and saw  three connect and ascend

content.detailedDescription: We were asleep, i awoke to a snap or pop and heard the fridge die down; i thought i smelled electricity and fearing a fire, sat up but before i could rise up, a blue rod of light came straight through the house, it entered through a window and exited another in a straight path approx. 45-50 ft. in length, it was 6 inches in width and i felt compelled to run my hand through it but didn't. it had a beginning a middle and an end, i watched the end go on out.  i ran to a side window to look out and a second rod ran through, it took about maybe a minute each. ran to the back of the house, where it came in and observed a big pulsating ball which was rolling but going nowhere, in the back yard.  called the electric co. next morning and asked if an electrical event happened, they called back end of the day and said 2 more houses a mile from mine had the blue rods go through same time.  no one reported the white ball.  they suggested it was ball lightning, so i looked it up but this moves and our sighting was rolling but stationary.  it faded out after a while then regenerated slightly then disappeared.
content.summary: Awoke to a snap sound, blue rod 6" thick thru house 2x. rotating white ball on ground after, about 5 ft. high, faded out and back in briefly.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter woke me up around 3:00 am and said she was scared to death. she said it sounded like the air conditioner unit but then it started pulsating. she had looked out her window and saw an unknown craft. we returned to her room and i immediately saw lights in the sky. it was hovering above the missouri river, about 2 miles away. she said it was much closer when it woke her. i thought it was a helicopter at first but the lights were odd. i think there were 3 lights but the movement was unnatural and hard to count. it appeared to be boomerang shaped with lights on wing tips and front and it was panning back & forth. that was the only way to the lights changing from 3 to 2 then 3 and so on. i tried to figure a flight path when it just vanished. it was also very unnerving since we live around 10 miles from the callaway nuclear plant. i had forgotten about it until i saw the episode of hangar one covering missouri hot spots.
content.summary: Boomerang ufo with pulsating hum

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east on a highway 11 on racine's south side when we noticed this triangle lighted object headed west towards us at a slow speed parallel to the highway and we noticed that it was not a plane. we stopped the car as the object had stopped almost directly over us and we adjacent to where a construction project was under way. the object was triangle shaped and i would guess it to be about 60-70 ft. on a side and about 500-600 ft.Up. i can remember bluish light and reddish orange light along the outer edges of the triangle, it was like they were neon tubes along the side. as it hovered it rotated slowly back and forth clockwise and counter clockwise and seemed to be looking for something. after about 15 minutes of this it started to move to the east slowly and suddenly it picked up speed and accelerated to the east at a wow! speed until it disappeared out over the lake. while we were observing this craft 2 other cars stopped and people got out of them and were watching it also. there was no conversation between any of us and after it was over everybody just got back in their cars and left. the next day there was no reports in the paper and we didn't report it either. this was approximately 13/4 miles west of lake michigan.
content.summary: Came form the eastand hovered over us for about 5min. than turned east and accellerated at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
i study physics,,and was working on space time.  i was outside observing the moon with my celestron telescope when i looked back over my shoulder.  i saw a object that i thought was a shooting star.  i turned and when to see if i could track it, but it had a sharp curvature to it.  as if the gravitational field, bounced it off the atomosphere.  northwest direction but then slung outward,, it never heated but glowed.   just as space debris would,, i had thought it was higher up.  

and 15 minutes later, i had called my wife to come and look,, and its then i saw the triangle shape,, the points of continous light.  and about a half mile behind it,, two fighter jets,, from what i could tell.  i was in military for a decade. i know what a fighter jet looks like and they were in winged formation for combat.  i followed them for maybe 3 to 4 minutes, and they flew out of sight. my wife saw the same objects.  even the one that looked like a meteor.  or what ever that was.
content.summary: Traiangle with 3 light,, one on each point

content.detailedDescription: I was at a child's birthday party here in my town. someone said that there was something on the sky, so everybody looked up (25 persons) and saw a very strong green and red ball of light that appeared between the moon and mars. the light  appeared suddenly, from nowhere. it moved to northeast, made a turn and went northwest and began to descent until it disappeared behind the house.
content.summary: Green and red ball of light that moved, changed direction and descended.

content.detailedDescription:
We were attempting to go climbing out in a place near sells, arizona.  my partner saw something strange in the rear view mirror, but he thought it was a trick of the light.  as we were driving we suddenly noticed jets in the sky that were flying with their afterburner, they seemed to be "freaking out" and were not flying in normal formation.  

suddenly, a giant orange orb appeared in the sky far away from the jets.  it split and divided in a straight line upwards.  only a couple of seconds later another orb appeared in the sky to the south and this split into 3 more orbs making a horizontal line. 

at this point we got out our cell phones and began recording - you can see us running through the gas station parking lot.  

the jets were chasing this object all over the sky, and as soon they would get to where it had been it would appear in a totally different direction.  a one point a black helicopter joined the fight. 

we observed the object splitting a few more times, until it finally went away.     

it's a rather long video, but the footage is pretty amazing!
content.summary: Bright orbs, like the phoenix light, appeared in the sky multiple time. one orb would split into several.

content.detailedDescription: Your recent tv show hanger 1 on the episode about the ufo seen in upstate new york the picture you first show is exactly what i and 8 other coal miners saw that night in 97  i am solo student pilot with 35 hrs flight time a usaf brat that was raised around aircraft i have studied military history for 40 years .  this craft glided over us and then picked up speed that looked like a 15 going into after burners x 10 it left the horizon to wet in mater of 30 seconds we were at  alt of 1600 feet and had clear star liit night clear weather
content.summary: Seen as 2shift crew left pilgrim # 3 mine wish to add info to report

content.detailedDescription:
Outside throwing football with a friend. my friend says "look at that, it's not a plane."
we observed the ufo slowing to a stop. i ran inside my house to get my mother, after she witnessed this, she alerted the neighbors. the craft hovered motionless as we watched it, then all the sudden split into 3 parts, each changing motions, directions, and colors, as if showing off saying look what i can do! the military and human race could only dream of technology this magnificent. no vapor trails or exhaust trails or sound at all, completely silent. 
the manuvers, angles, speed, and light show could no way be duplicated by anything man made. an event i will never forget, and zero drugs or alcohol have ever been taken by myself nor the other witnesses.
content.summary: 1 ship separated into 3, showed off its intelligence with brilliant colors including bright silver. incredible technology

content.detailedDescription: I had gotten off work and went out on my side porch when i happened to look up and see them moving back and forth. they were green (almost a luminescent color).I just stood there in awe and watched them fly over. i asked myself about what i had just seen and before i could get into my my front yard, they had disappeared. i wrote a letter to mufon and have yet hear anything back. my house is 1/4 mile from offutt afb, which was strategic air command at that time. i now can't remember if the year was 2003. i had a friend die in the year this occurred. my oldest son's birthday was that day.
content.summary: The object were zigzagging as if they were playing a game.

content.detailedDescription: At around 2:30 in the morning i heard a rumbling  sound outside.  the house is near a railine but this sound was coming from above.  i went outside and saw a craft passing above the house.  it seemed about the size of my hand in the sky which would make it decent sized up close.  now we get jets and stealth flying over often from whitman so i know what they look like.  this was something i had never seen.  it was a longish triangle shape with lights strobing from front to back along the bottom.  the lights went from reddish to blue.  the craft flew from nw to ne not seeming to change in altitude  and was in vision for about 15 minutes.  soon after two jets followed.  i only report this because i just saw a discription on a history channel program dealing with ufos and missouri.  the image they showed was startlingly the same as what i saw
content.summary: Object flew over head low in sky with lights strobbing from front to back producing rumbling sound

content.detailedDescription:
1.) i was at my fathers house, it was just me and him and it was approximately 1130pm. i was going out side to check out the moon! it was tremendously bright that night. 

2.) the first noticed it once walked out my door it was directly to my left about 75 feet away and also how bright it was, but at the same time a dark blue! 

3.) i honestly thought it was a remote control device or a drone. but then 6 to 7 helicopters on the left side of the craft still a good 3 to 4 mins away.

4.) it flew kinda like a humming bird because the object would just stop after reaching fast speeds. also the lights were spinning in the center of this object as the surfaced remained blue. but once helicopters came in closer it would turned off the blue surface lighting and some how turned vertically instead of horizontally! i had to grab my father because he needed to see this for the reason of believing in the unbelievable! i have waited 20 years, which is my whole life to see a ufo and the fact that my traditional dad with his traditional life can think back to that night and really think bigger then himself on this little blue marble in the universe. 
  
5.) i have never been more happy in my life. the fact that i can show a video and a story with anyone and even if they try to mock my story, i know it comes from fear that we have a enormous universe and there is still a lot we don't know! 

6.) once the helicopters came within 100 yards away or so it fly over the houses and that was the last i saw of that incredible object. blew my mind
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I have waited my whole life to make my father who is a very realistic person, to be struck with pure silence!

content.detailedDescription: My fianc�� and i went out on our balcony to watch the blood moon event. when we noticed what we thought was a star. as i said look there is only one star out it moved. we started watching it as it went from one side of the moon to the other. then three more appeared. they all were hovering around the moon and circling it. we watched for at least an hour but had to go in to get to bed. we did get pictures and one video before we went inside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched them in the sky around the moon

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were taking our brother to basketball practice around 6:00 pm. i was looking around the sky when i spotted a glowing sphere hovering stationary. it stayed stationary for about 5 more seconds until it started to ascend and gain speed at the same time. by then i informed my sister and little brother about the ufo. they spotted it soon after. we pulled off the road onto a rest area, and watched the object. it stopped it path of flight and hovered for a few seconds until it released another with,blue glowing orb. the main object started back onto its path of flight, and the second object followed in an almost identical path. soon after they both were ascending, when the second orb released a faint, and small object. that one fell straight down to the ground and dissipated as it got closer to the ground. after it was gone out of sight. the two objects collided and went back to one larger object and ascended into the sky until it also disappeared from eye sight.
content.summary: White/blue/silver. two sphere's

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from taking my son to work. it was close to 10:15 pm monday evening 5-12-14. at the intersection of decatur and clark avenue i was at a stop sign about to turn right onto clark ave. out my left window i saw an object flying slowly with lights under neath .I immediately thought it was a plane but noticed it was triangular. because it was triangular it made me look a little better, and underneath the center of the bottom i noticed an orange light. there were other lights along the v shape at the point area of the v then down each side of the v- but the orange light in the center of the bottom really caught my eye. i think there were white lights ,but i really don't remember how many or what other colors there were.Since i was driving i didn't stay stopped at the intersection, but i noticed it was moving south or southwest, it seemed more slowly than an airplane would move.I turned right onto clark which is the street we live on and rushed out of my car . it took me half a minute or so to get to our home. when i got out i tried to see it as soon as i got out of my car but could not see it in the sky either it was gone from my sight or the trees around blocked me seeing it again.When i got out of my car my one son was in the back yard smoking a cigarette and i immediately told him i saw a v shaped object, and i walked to the front yard to look up to see if i could spot it again. i did not see it again. i would really like to know if anybody else saw this object last night. i would love to know. i was pretty excited to see it, and really wondered what it was.
content.summary: I saw a triangle shaped airplane like object as i was turning from decatur onto clark avenueto left out my car window

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside after the hockey game (around 10 pm) i noticed 5 lights in the sky, far out and not too high up.  the lights seemed to not be moving, but i thought they seemed to move a bit.  during the few minutes that i watched i saw the top left (to my sight), bottom left, and top middle lights disperse from one-another and disappear completely.  
that left the 2 other lights.  they seemed to move together further past my line of sight towards the east.

i tried to get pictures with my cell phone, but unfortunately it was tracing lower lights and ignored what i wanted to capture.

unfortunately my dad went to the washroom after the game while i was outside and before i could get him from upstairs and out in the back yard the lights were gone.
content.summary: 5 bright lights moving in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
While looking at an airplane, we noticed a whit, round dot in the sky. we called the sheriff and they made a report they saw it also
since it never moved we didn't think it was a balloon . it stayed 6 hrs. 
we had to get in the shade and there it was. 
straight overhead
content.summary: Round white dot straight overhead, no lights, sounds

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:53 pm last night, my wife and i were sitting outside in our yard. i noticed the "craft" flying over by our house on the exact flight path into san diego. it looked like a chevron consisting of 3 white spheres on each arm of the chevron in a straight line. it gave the appearance of a craft like the stealth bomber but with a row (3) circular spheres forming each "wing". the lights were white in color. as it came into view, the lights split apart and then i knew it wasn't a solid craft but multiple spheres making themselves appear to look like a singular craft. as they broke apart and started to fly around each other, they as a whole changed direction from straight west to wnw. the lights diminished to nothing,  and then appeared to be brownish colored spheres, almost like beans. there was no emitting from them and they weren't perfect spheres. i was excited due to it being my fourth ufo sighting in my life. one of my experiences took place in st. john, usvi in 1995 which was very dramatic, and i was approached by a "man in black", experienced telepathy, etc. i will fill out another one on that incident soon.

sincerely,
james
content.summary: 6 white spheres in a chevron shape on the exact flight path into sd airport (they fly over our house) then the chevron came apart and the spheres changed direction to wnw and then they went dark like a copper brown color. they flew around each other.

content.detailedDescription: Ive been trackin bigfoot with many photos as evidence during a check of my trail cam pics i found a face of a green aliens face looking directly at the cameta and it looks pissed i have had many encounters and videos of the craft hovering outside in the yard i believe i got there face  the pic everybody wants to see its letting off a green ray from its eyes
content.summary: I have a photo of a greenaliensface on mytrailcamand many videos of theship

content.detailedDescription:
Earlier that evening me and my boyfriend were at a friends place who lived about ten minutes away from us. we had a few drinks at this friends place and did not get home until around 3am. i had decided to go out for a smoke before i went to bed and went outside our place to the front steps. our street is very very dark there are no street lamps at all. i looked up and noticed these really bright lights. i thought, that can't be a plane because its way too bright, so i ran inside and tried to get my husband to come out and look, he suggested i get it on my phone and thought what a great idea and grabbed my phone and went back out onto the front steps. i staggered down to get better video footage and decided that i might get better footage on the top steps and went back to the top step and kept recording. i was trying to zoom my camera in and out and because i was intoxicated i continued to move the phone around trying to focus. the object hovered there the entire time i was recording. the object did not move at all and made no noise at all. i was amazed and my heart was beating so fast because i knew that this had to be a ufo there was no other explanation. there was no cars driving by at all and it was dark and quiet outside my place. after about ten minutes i went back inside to see what my boyfriend was doing and woke him up to show him the footage. he became excited as i was and couldn't believe it. we both went outside for a smoke and the sky was becoming daylight and we heard jets flying above us and thought that was odd. we called our friends who;s place were were at earlier that night to tell them because we couldn't believe it.
the reason i am sending this is because i want to know weather this was a ufo sighting or not.
content.summary: I noticed these really bright lights above the tree in front of my place, i knew it was not a plane because it was too bright and it hovered there.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving for the store at about 9:30 pm when i noticed three bright, red-orange objects in the sky. they were rather distant from each other, but they formed a perfect, straight line from about 20-50˚ above the horizon. i didn���t see them for long because i had to turn a corner into our subdivision, but i rolled down the window to see if i could hear anything. our house is close to both a hospital with a helipad and the purdue university airport, but vehicles from either of those places are extremely audible from the ground; the objects in the sky, that night, were absolutely silent.

the store is only three minutes away, and i was only inside long enough to grab one item. when i pulled back onto the road to head home, there were at least seven of these objects in the air���still in a straight line, but now reaching from about 10˚ above the horizon. (it���s possible a lower one had been there before; there would have been trees in the way, on the road i was first traveling.) at 9:42:24 i texted my wife:

me: ���look outside!

me: ���ufos!���

my wife: ���what are those?!���

me: ���they���re everywhere.���

wife: ���smells like fire outside���

me: ���you can't see most from here, but there are like a dozen in a straight line from the horizon on up.���

me: ���two just disappeared.���

wife: ���are you almost home?!���

by that point, i actually was home and was standing in the driveway, doing my best to film the last 2-3 remaining lights with my ipad. each followed the same path, ascending at what appeared, from my vantage point, to be at approximately a 60˚ angle, until they reached a certain point in the sky. at that same point, each light would begin to twinkle and slowly dim. after about a minute of dimming at that specific, stationary point, it would disappear completely.

finally, i know this sounds ridiculous, but i was about to upload the video i took and discovered that it is missing from my ipad. there are three photos from the same evening, plus 76 photos and two videos from the next day (when my two-year-old went to town with it). but for some reason, the video in question is just�����gone. i even ran recovery software on it; it found over 600 deleted photos dating back to the first of the year, but my video from saturday night is conspicuously missing. hmm���
content.summary: About seven red-orange lights, ascending along the same straight trajectory before disappearing at the same point

content.detailedDescription:
1. passenger on southwest airlines flt 299 dal-mci. plane was at cruising altitude. mid-end of flight.
2. glanced out the window and it caught my eye.
3. the tail fin of a southbound plane.
4. object did not appear to be moving horizontally. seemed to fade in and out of a cloud bank. was initially tilted at a 45 degree angle, then appeared to flatten out as the plane passed by. could not see a fuselage. when it didn't appear to move i began taking pictures.
5. it seemed too close for a plane. i thought it might be an unusual shaped dark cloud (there were storm over kansas city the night before and that day but there no other dark clouds around and it looked very straight and solid. i didn't think about it anymore until i returned to dallas the following day and showed the pictures to my family. 
6. i don't remember.
content.summary: Black. appeared to be a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
Three girls were taking photos of the sea, then the object appeared in the sky. the girl who was with the camera managed to capture the image, but to try another photo the object was gone, and the birds in the sky that were previously also disappeared.

before the object appears, the birds were agitated. after the appearance of the witnesses cried.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
- taking pictures of the sea and landscape.

2. what made you first notice the object?
- while a witness took pictures, his friend showed the object appeared in the sky. then she managed to capture the image.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
- i do not know, but they were afraid.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
- the object appeared in the sky was a few seconds and then disappeared. birds that were nearby also gone.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
- the girl with camera managed to take a picture, but only one. in another photo there was nothing: neither the object nor the birds. 
one of the girls got very excited and scared, then cried. 
that night they would go out for dinner, but were not, were still shocked.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
- ele simplesmente sumiu. devido a excita����o e o medo, elas nem perceberam como.
content.summary: Object appeared and disappeared after a few seconds. the birds are gone too.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the moon the day after the passover when was turning red, when i did took pictures didn't saw that but them when i down load to my computer is when i saw the object.
content.summary: Egg shape light

content.detailedDescription: A friend & i were on our way home from a friends house, he was driveing on north ave headed south to metro. a few miles from town we noticed a white light framed in the rd but 30 to 50 ft above the tallest trees, we new that there was no light or structure there & said what's that helacopter doing there above the rd? then the front white light went off & the back two came on, it was only then when we could see it was a triangle with rounded corners, & was jet black just sitting there in broad daylight. by then we were comeing up on it quick & were kinda freaking out a bit, my buddy almost took a quick left at the church to avoid going under it, but i grabbed the wheel & held it strait, i wanted to see just what this thing was but new it was nothing i could recognize, as we were about to drive under it, it started spinning in place slowly & drifting to the right over the rd we now turned on to go home. i had my window down & jumped on the door frame & sat on the door half in half out, staring up at this black triangle & could not belive my eyes, it made no sound what so ever, i could hear lawn mowers 4 yards away but not this thing right above my head, i felt like i was shot with adrinilen, my heart was pounding & i'm screaming at my buddy & banging on the roof of the car, saying i can't belive were seeing this! it's a real ufo!! i got a great look at it, we seemed to have disturbed it by driving under it somehow but it didn't care, it just started slowly rotating in place & casualy snaking it's way over the houses & back of the cematary, headed northwest & slowly drifted out of site. i had never even herd of a triangular ufo before & it was yrs later that i saw on tv a show called ufo's over i'll, where a bunch of cops were chasing a triangle the size of a football field up around st louis millstad lebanon & shillow. as i watched the date was the same day as our siting only ours was small 9/9/9 i think it linked up with the bigger one later that night. allso the craft i saw, was a dead ringer for the rendelshem bentwatters woodbridge craft, only i couldn't see the top of mine, to me it only looked about 2 ft thick & flat, but i just saw it from the bottom. all i can say is this was not one of ours & if it was we got it from them, there is no doubt in my mind, what so ever, that what i saw that day was not from this earth. one word kept coming to my mind, it's perffact it's perffact. i wish the gov would just come clean already & stop lieing to us, we have the rite to know that we are not alone. but it's quite a big bite to chew, everything i thought i knew, was turned upside down that day,& now i see things very differently & not a day has gone by that i don't think of what & who's really out there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black triangle, lights on all 3 points, silent 30or50 above trees, started rotating 360dg & drifting in a serpentine fashion when we drove under it, not one of ours!!

content.detailedDescription: I was at the porch of my house when i saw an ufo ascending from the top of the trees into the sky moving in zig zag till it disappear.
content.summary: Saw an ufo moving very fast in "zigzag" from the top of the trees into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
West bound on highway 58 going into the city of oakridge in oregon i saw above the airport area of the skyline 1/2 dozen lights in a row, very bright red glowing/hovering, like the arizona lights... they were there then they faded into the clouds as the clouds moved to envelope them. i contacted the air port in eugene and there were no flares launched/dropped. there is no one up @ oakridge air port to do that. eugene air port told me they launched no flares on that date. i would classify this sighting as significant due to the number of craft in the sighting. there is no way the other people on the highway did not see what i was seeing!

anyone else who saw this sighting please come forward.
content.summary: I saw 1/2 dozen lights, red, that were in a line.Hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke out of my sleep at 2am(i've been waking up at this time for a long time now) for a unknown reason i had a strong urge to go outside so i did and looked at the sky as soon as i did i see this light orb falling from the sky and is hidden by trees after viewing for 5-20mins. i start thinking to myself i'm i really seeing this. i wait to see if i will see it again and sure enough i do heading towards the direction i first noticed it. 
when i first saw it i thought it was a normal star then seeing as it moved as if it was being controlled i knew it wasnt a star!! it moved slowly from the top of the sky to the bottom then few mins later flew from the bottom of the sky back to the top. during this whole time i was some what frozen.  i wasnt scared at all but i had an overwhelming feeling that i'm no bigger then an ant. i lost sight of this orb as it flew past the stars....This is not the first time ive seen these things. ive seen them at least 6times all in my neighborhood over the past year or so. ive seen 3-4 of them hanging in the sky then just vanish then appear then take off at a high rate of speed. ive seen them just slowly flying across the sky multiple occasions. i tried telling friends family etc. no one cares. it doesnt matter how many times i see them i still get the same frozen feeling and feeling very small. after it flew away i sat on the ground outside my room and just sat there for 30mins. these orbs are up there and there watching!!!!!
content.summary: Light orb from sky coming down then mins later flying back to space (like a star falling slowly then flying back to the sky)
